attributes.action: call on the BBC to reinstate Moira Stuart.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Moopy.org.uk recognises the great contribution Moria Stuart has brought to news programming over the last 20 years. Amongst accusations of ageism and sexism, it can only be right that the Prime Minister calls on the BBC to review their decision to remove Moria Stuart from mainstream BBC news.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
